meta_data.description: This course focuses on the development of basic listening and speaking skills on day-to-day topics.
This course helps students to learn to identify and articulate suggestions, opinions, and locate specific facts from spoken English.
This course focuses on helping students learn to identify and articulate comparison and contrasts in spoken English as well as summarize information they hear.
By the end of this major, students will be able to identify audience and give a short presentation on a researched topic.

description: This major helps students to communicate and debate with authority across a wide range of topics.
key_major_takeaways: Articulate suggestions, opinions and locate specific facts
